dt: {bc}the production of a rapid succession of images in a motion picture to illustrate an association of ideas
{bc}a literary, musical, or artistic composite {dx_def}see {dxt|composite:2||1}{/dx_def} of {d_link|juxtaposed|juxtaposed} more or less {d_link|heterogeneous|heterogeneous} elements
{bc}a composite picture made by combining several separate pictures

et: borrowed from French, "act of rising, act of moving things to a higher place, assembly of a mechanism from its components, editing of film shots to make a coherent whole," from {it}monter{/it} "to climb, get up onto (a horse), move to a higher place, assemble from component parts, assemble (film shots) into a coherent whole" (going back to Old French, "to climb, get up onto a horse, set up") + {it}-age{/it} {ma}{mat|mount:2|}{/ma}
shortdef: the production of a rapid succession of images in a motion picture to illustrate an association of ideas
a literary, musical, or artistic composite of juxtaposed more or less heterogeneous elements
a composite picture made by combining several separate pictures

dt: {bc}to combine into or depict in a montage

shortdef: to combine into or depict in a montage
